dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2926 IS: To revise the boundaries of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Sachuest Point Unit RI–04P, Easton Beach Unit RI–05P, Almy Pond Unit RI–06, and Hazards Beach Unit RI–07 in the State of Rhode Island.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Reed introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To revise the boundaries of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Sachuest Point Unit RI–04P, Easton Beach Unit RI–05P, Almy Pond Unit RI–06, and Hazards Beach Unit RI–07 in the State of Rhode Island.

section.header: Replacement of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System map

subsection.text: In this section, the term Map means the map that—

paragraph.text: is included in the set of maps entitled John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System (referred to in section 4(a) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act ( 16 U.S.C. 3503(a) ) as the set of maps entitled Coastal Barrier Resources System); and
relates to certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in the State of Rhode Island.

subsection.text: The Map is replaced by the map entitled John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Sachuest Point Unit RI–04P, Easton Beach Unit RI–05P, Almy Pond Unit RI–06, and Hazards Beach Unit RI–07 and dated September 30, 2009.

The Secretary of the Interior shall keep the replacement map referred to in subsection (b) on file and available for inspection in accordance with
section 4(b) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act ( 16 U.S.C. 3503(b) ).
